comment:
* Abstraction of a "Smart Suggestion" component responsible to embed the autofill UI provided by * the augmented autofill service. * *

The Smart Suggestion is represented by a {@link Area} object that contains the * dimensions the smart suggestion window, so the service can use it to calculate the size of the * view that will be passed to {@link FillWindow#update(Area, View, long)}. * * @hide

methods.name: public Area getSuggestionArea()
methods.comment:
* Gets the area of the suggestion strip for the given {@code metadata}
     *
     * @return strip dimensions, or {@code null} if the Smart Suggestion provider does not support
     * suggestions strip.

methods.name: abstract void dump(String prefix, PrintWriter pw)

methodNames: abstract void dump(String prefix, PrintWriter pw)
